import React from "react"; import Product from "../products"; import { Row, Col, ListGroup, Button, Image, ListGroupItem, } from "react-bootstrap"; import Rating from "../components/Rating"; import { Link } from "react-router-dom"; function ProductDetails({ match }) { const product = Product.find((p) => p._id === match.params.id); return (
if({product.countInStock} === 0) {

{product.name}

 Price : ${product.price} {product.description} Status : {product.countInStock > 0 ? "In stock" : "Out of stock"} {/* */}
} else{" "} {

 Price : ${product.price} {product.description} Status : {product.countInStock > 0 ? "In stock" : "Out of stock"}
}
); } export default ProductDetails;
